body:
**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):

Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"4+", GitVersion:"v1.4.0-beta.11", GitCommit:"4b28af1232cc52da453eb4ebe3dc001314a1f99b", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2016-09-23T22:53:01Z", GoVersion:"go1.6.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"4", GitVersion:"v1.4.0", GitCommit:"a16c0a7f71a6f93c7e0f222d961f4675cd97a46b", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2016-09-26T18:10:32Z", GoVersion:"go1.6.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

**Environment**:
AWS - CentOS 7.2 x86_64 with cloud-init (HVM) (ami-666a7507)
- **OS** (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
  NAME="CentOS Linux"
  VERSION="7 (Core)"
  ID="centos"
  ID_LIKE="rhel fedora"
  VERSION_ID="7"
  PRETTY_NAME="CentOS Linux 7 (Core)"
  ANSI_COLOR="0;31"
  CPE_NAME="cpe:/o:centos:centos:7"
  HOME_URL="https://www.centos.org/"
  BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.centos.org/"

CENTOS_MANTISBT_PROJECT="CentOS-7"
CENTOS_MANTISBT_PROJECT_VERSION="7"
REDHAT_SUPPORT_PRODUCT="centos"
REDHAT_SUPPORT_PRODUCT_VERSION="7"

Linux ip-172-31-35-103 3.10.0-327.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Nov 19 22:10:57 UTC 2015 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
- **Install tools**:
- **Others**:

**What happened**:
when selinux is enabled   i was getting following error on discovery container

``` sh
[root@ip-172-31-35-103 ec2-user]# docker logs 905535c9a143
2016/09/27 07:50:38 Unable to open root CA certificate ("/tmp/secret/ca.pem" [open /tmp/secret/ca.pem: permission denied])
```

**What you expected to happen**:
i expected node to be able to join master, but  nothing was running on 9898 port of master i.e. discovery due the error mentioned above

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible):
use the api which i gave you and do normal kubeadm init 

**Anything else do we need to know**:
This issue got fixed with setenforce 0

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: kubeadm join issue on CentOS 7.2 (when selinux is enabled)
